content.text: Fixing the broken last-mile of delivery
In 2017, a lightbulb went off. Could the pain of last-mile delivery be reduced for everyone?

primary.title: OUR MISSION
primary.description: Delivery is broken. Our mission is to support the world’s transition to online shopping by making the last-mile experience faster, easier, and less stressful for all. Saving both time and money.

primary.title: OUR VISION
primary.description: Our vision is to make delivery easy for everyone. We want to be the world’s best last-mile delivery experience. For delivery drivers, this means that we improve every aspect of the driver’s day.

items.title: Value-measured
items.bodyText: Our value is measured in how useful Circuit is to our customers, and not by extorting it from them.

items.title: Customer-focused
items.bodyText: We view the world through our customer’s eyes and make solutions for the problems to be solved.

items.title: Brave
items.bodyText: We look for opportunities for things to be 10x better than they were before. Almost nothing is "impossible".

items.title: Innovative
items.bodyText: We’re more interested in reaching the right outcome than being correct. We always learn and improve.

items.title: Transparent
items.bodyText: We give and get frank and constructive feedback often. We measure the impact of our work, not the effort.

items.title: Challenging
items.bodyText: We question our assumptions and the way things are done. We seek to distrupt the status quo.

primary.title: We look forward to a future where last-mile delivery is more:
OUR TEAM
primary.description: We’re a team of app developers and professionals committed to making the last-mile delivery experience faster, easier, and less stressful for all.

primary.title: Hear from a Circuit driver
primary.description: Alex Maxey works as a courier for a large company in Ontario, Canada doing multiple deliveries each day. Here's why he uses Circuit to make his life "infinitely easier".

video.title: Why this Courier's Life is Made Infinitely Easier by Circuit Route Planner

items.ArticleTitle: Interview with Jack Underwood, Co-founder and CEO at Delivery Experience Company: Circuit
items.ArticleDescription: Jack Underwood speaks to Techround about his aspirations, business challenges, and how Circuit is helping to make delivery easy.

ArticleImage.alt: What Makes a Great Delivery Experience? Key Findings in Our Data

items.ArticleTitle: What Makes a Great Delivery Experience? Key Findings in Our Data
items.ArticleDescription: We surveyed 275 people who regularly get packages through delivery services, and asked them what makes a high-quality delivery experience.

ArticleImage.alt: Twitter Agrees Timely Delivery is the Key to Customer Success

items.ArticleTitle: Twitter Agrees Timely Delivery is the Key to Customer Success
items.ArticleDescription: We analyzed over 6000 tweets of UK courier companies, to understand the sentiment behind what customers say makes a poor delivery experience.
